    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • explain

        public static void explain()
        Prints a simples explanation of groups and Coxeter groups, along with a small demonstration.

      • getClassA

        @NotNull
private static @NotNull ClassA getClassA(java.util.Scanner s,
                                                   int l)
        Returns a permutation written in the Scanner
        Parameters:
        s - the Scanner that the user will write the permutation in
        l - the length of the permutation
        Returns:
        the class A group of that permutation

      • findH3Generators

        public static void findH3Generators()
        Prints potential triples of generators of an H3 Coxeter group. All generators must have order 2, the product of the first two must have order 5, the product of the last two must have order 3, and the product of the first and the last must have order 2.

      • h3ElementsByLength

        public static void h3ElementsByLength(H3 a,
                                      H3 b,
                                      H3 c)
        Prints all the elements of H3 arranged by their reduced word length with the generator set a,b,c.
        Parameters:
        a - A generator such that ord(a) = 2, ord(a*b) = 5, ord(a*c) = 2
        b - A generator such that ord(b) = 2, ord(b*a) = 5, ord(b*c) = 3
        c - A generator such that ord(c) = 2, ord(c*a) = 2, ord(c*b) = 3
